channel.title: Friends cant connect to client

item.title: Friends cant connect to client
item.dc:creator: @sonsofgod2 sonsofgod2
item.description:
@sonsofgod2 wrote:

Alright so just got a project insaity base edited ect. then i went opened it went to client.java and type ctrl +f typed server got this

if((j == 13 || j == 10) && inputString.length() > 0) {
if(myPrivilege == 2 || server.equals(“127.1.0.0”) || 1 == 1/to remove/) {
if(inputString.startsWith("//setspecto")) {

i changed the ip to my computer ip. am i suppose 2 change it to my ipv4 addres. or my interenet addres. anyway i changed to my internet address. and my friend downloaded opened and when he tryed playing client it says couldnt find path. so then i went back to client.java and searched all the server= thing and entered my internet ip. and am i suppose 2 compile after doing this. cuz my compiler doesnt work for client but for server it does. PLEASE HELP

Read full topic
